RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON May 19 ( Reuters ) - The White House said on Monday the U.S. indictment of five Chinese military officers for allegedly hacking American companies and stealing trade secrets reflected U.S. concern that China has continued to engage in cyber spying against the United States .
